['Boiler SDL1','DS1 Slight'].damage_state_definitions: Minor deformation to supporting structure and minor damage at lateral restraint points to boiler.  No internal damage to boiler.

['Boiler SDL1','DS2 Moderate'].damage_state_definitions: Significant deformation to supporting structure with deformation at holding down bolts and yielding of bracing elements.  Damage to internal boiler pipes requiring access for repair.

['Boiler SDL1','DS3 Extensive'].damage_state_definitions: Major damage to boiler support with failure of many bracing elements.  Large deformations damage connecting pipework. Widespread damage to internal steam pipes in boiler requring extensive replacement.

['Boiler SDL2','DS1 Slight'].damage_state_definitions: Minor deformation to supporting structure and minor damage at lateral restraint points to boiler.  No internal damage to boiler.

['Boiler SDL2','DS2 Moderate'].damage_state_definitions: Significant deformation to supporting structure with deformation at holding down bolts and yielding of bracing elements.  Damage to internal boiler pipes requiring access for repair.

['Boiler SDL2','DS3 Extensive'].damage_state_definitions: Major damage to boiler support with failure of many bracing elements.  Large deformations damage connecting pipework. Widespread damage to internal steam pipes in boiler requring extensive replacement.

['Boiler SDL3','DS1 Slight'].damage_state_definitions: Minor deformation to supporting structure and minor damage at lateral restraint points to boiler.  No internal damage to boiler.

['Boiler SDL3','DS2 Moderate'].damage_state_definitions: Significant deformation to supporting structure with deformation at holding down bolts and yielding of bracing elements.  Damage to internal boiler pipes requiring access for repair.

['Boiler SDL3','DS3 Extensive'].damage_state_definitions: Major damage to boiler support with failure of many bracing elements.  Large deformations damage connecting pipework. Widespread damage to internal steam pipes in boiler requring extensive replacement.

['Coal Yard SDL1','DS1 Slight'].damage_state_definitions: Minor deformations in connections or hairline cracks in a few welds.  Minor brace deformation.  Some deformation at hold down bolts.

['Coal Yard SDL1','DS2 Moderate'].damage_state_definitions: Some steel members have yielded exhibiting observable permanent rotations at connections.  A few welded connections may exhibit major cracks through welds or a few bolted connections may exhibit broken bolts or enlarged bolt holes.  Some yielding of braces and soem anchor bolts stretched.

['Coal Yard SDL1','DS3 Extensive'].damage_state_definitions: Many steel bracing elements have exceeded their yield capacity resulting in significant permanent lateral deformation of the structure.  Many truss arch members have buckeld in compression.  Some of the structural connections may have exceeded their ultimate capacity exhibited by major permanent member rotations at connections, buckled flanges and failed connections.  Some foundation oviement due to settlement and some anchor bolts failed.

['Coal Yard SDL1','DS4 Complete'].damage_state_definitions: A significant proportion of the structural elements have exceeded their ultimate capacities or some critical structural elements or connections have failed resulting in dangerous permanent lateral displacement, partial collapse or collapse of the shelter structure.

['Coal Yard SDL2','DS1 Slight'].damage_state_definitions: Minor deformations in connections or hairline cracks in a few welds.  Minor brace deformation.  Some deformation at hold down bolts.

Some foundation oviement due to settlement and some anchor bolts failed.

['Cooling System SDL1','DS2 Moderate'].damage_state_definitions: Moderate structural damage to pumphouse superstructure.  Deformation of pump hold-down and pipework with some leakage at flanges and valves.  Some movement of pumphouse substructure due to liquefaction.

['Cooling System SDL1','DS3 Extensive'].damage_state_definitions: Rupture of some water mains due to failure of  supporting strucuture. Movement of pumphouse substructure and other valve chambers leading to damage to water mains.
